executeMandate(address,uint16,bytes,uint.details: Called by the Powers protocol during action execution

params.mandateCalldata: ABI encoded input data: abi.encode(uint256 createPoolActionId).
params.mandateId: The ID of this specific mandate instance.
params.nonce: A unique nonce for replay protection.
params.powers: The address of the Powers contract instance.

returns.actionId: Unique ID for this action proposal.
returns.calldatas: Array containing the three encoded calls to Powers.adoptMandate.
returns.targets: Array containing the Powers address three times.

params.config: Abi.encode(address treasuryPools, address soi, address bespoke, uint16 createPoolMandateId).
params.index: The unique index assigned by Powers.sol.
params.inputParams: ABI encoded string[] describing required inputs for execute.

executeMandate(address,uint16,bytes,uint.notice: Executes the mandate's logic: validation -> handling request -> call external -> replying to Powers

getConfigData(address,uint16).notice: Retrieves the config data for a given factory mandate instance.

handleRequest(address,address,uint16,byt.notice: Prepares the calls to adopt the three governance mandates.
